name: Take-home-exam-3-csis-604
body:
### Part 1 - MPI Sorting (50%)
* Implementing your sorting routine from the previous take home exam using standard MPI libraries in the language of your choice
* Must have communication between 3 or more virtual machines
* Solution must be able to run on your Ubuntu server virtual machine

### Part 2 - Message Queue (50%)
* Implementing your sorting routine from the previous take home exam using message queue libraries in the language of your choice
* Must have communication between 3 or more virtual machines
* Solution must be able to run on your Ubuntu server virtual machine
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
